metadata.name: Hyperlyte multi electrolyte Concentrate 0 03 g 100ml Solution

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For use as part of electrolyte supplementation in total parenteral nutrition FDA Label

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Used as part of electrolyte salts to maintain cation anion balance in solutions

incompatibilities.description: Gluconic Acid may decrease effectiveness of Technetium Tc 99m oxidronate as a diagnostic agent
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Torasemide is combined with Gluconic Acid
